name: Dr Bones
description:
A fun little guess-the-word game to teach a selection of bones from the human skeleton.

This game was made for a college assignment. The brief was to create an app or game, using Adobe Animate CC and ActionScript3, to teach children an applied science. 

The game is not fully finished, however it is in its final run of testing. Any issues or bugs you find, you can let us know through this small survey: 

https://surveyhero.com/c/3a3f6900
